title: Let's Connect
subHeading: You can easily find me on these Plateform.

plateform.name: Makers Kitchen
plateform.about_it: It's a place where 2k+ Indie Makers, Programmers and Developers around the world growing and building their ideas together

plateform.name: Twitter
plateform.about_it: Everyone know about the twitter and the power of some words. So, I play around 2 hours/day on this awesome social network.

plateform.name: Twitch
plateform.about_it: I just started twitch for Streamming some of my coding work and I'm also building small application with public apis(https://public-apis.xyz)

plateform.name: Telegram
plateform.about_it: I'm using Telegram as a chat messanger because it have lots of cool features.
